meta.title: query %parameters%
meta.description:
Query and join one or more data sources, return a structure that can return an SQL to run
Supported datasets: RDBMS, XML, HTML, Excel and csv-files.

parameters.title: Query statement
parameters.description: A structure that defines the query statement, see schemas/sql.json. Returns a QAL dataset.

meta.title: merge %parameters%
meta.description:
Merge a source QAL dataset into a destination QAL dataset.
Used to transform and to merge datasets vertically (as opposed to joins)

parameters.title: Merge
parameters.description: A structure that defines the m, see schemas/sql.json. Returns a QAL dataset.
